name: R S N V FOUNDATION (TRUST)
briefDescription: At our sharanalayan dhaya we gives  shelter for more than 130 children. they all find mothers love,and a fathers affection and the kindness of many well wishers,At our jothi many multiple deformed children who have none to take care and attention here.they enjoy a happy and secure life here.At our jheevan  serves as a home and hospital for the numerous people living with AIDS. AT THIRD EYE we integrate autistic children to the main stream of education.Sweehar is the only government recognized legalized adoption agency since 2007 in four districts
